oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The people of !nanni's country do not kill the snake that is found near a grave, because the snake is the dead person's snake and it is the spirit of the dead. Similarly the people do not kill other animals (such as antelope and lizards) which are found near graves. They are considered to be spirit
animals or spirits of the dead.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A snake found near a grave
